author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...IMELDA CLOSING IN ON BERMUDA WITH HAZARDOUS WINDS EXPECTED TO INCREASE TONIGHT... ...HURRICANE-FORCE WINDS, DAMAGING WAVES, AND FLASH FLOODING EXPECTED OVER BERMUDA INTO EARLY THURSDAY...
summary: ...IMELDA CLOSING IN ON BERMUDA WITH HAZARDOUS WINDS EXPECTED TO INCREASE TONIGHT... ...HURRICANE-FORCE WINDS, DAMAGING WAVES, AND FLASH FLOODING EXPECTED OVER BERMUDA INTO EARLY THURSDAY... As of 8:00 PM AST Wed Oct 01 the center of Imelda was located near 31.8, -66.4 with movement ENE at 24 mph. The minimum central pressure was 971 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 100 mph.

title: Summary - Hurricane Imelda (AT4/AL092025)
